thread.section_title: Apostrophe Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Holiday
thread.title_full: Holiday - Review of Apostrophe Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Lorna L
title: Holiday
text: I have just had a great 4 day break with my son and his wife in Paris, and in the apostrophe hotel. The loveliest wee hotel, all the staff were so friendly and genuinely wanted to guide and help you have the best experience all round. My room was spotless.. I cannot say anything negative about this hotel.. keep up the good work guys .. thank you from Scotland.
